name: A Maze in A Daze
description: Players of this game will not be able to access its highscore board when playing it here at itch.io. This is due to the fact that itch.io does not support external highscore systems (as of April 20, 2022). Therefore, if you as a player want to save your time of completion, you will have to do that yourself by taking a screenshot or otherwise. In spite of the highscore system the game is fully functional.
